oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Esau Jenkins on Sea Islands political organization
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Esau Jenkins speaking on Sea Islands political organization.

Esau Jenkins was a South Carolina businessman, community organizer, and civil and human rights leader. His primary mission was to help the African American community of the Sea Islands around Charleston, South Carolina. He purchased buses to send them to better schools in the city. Local Septima Clark recruited him through Highlander to run citizenship schools and voter registration drives in his area to increase civic literacy and voter turnout
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Literacy tests (Election law); Voter registration; Jenkins, Esau, 1910-1972; Sea Islands; Political activity
